title: Lately I ahve been expereince immense ms/ping issues
body: Normally i would be around 120-160 ping constantly ingame through my internet but these past 2-3 days I have had 500-700 ping constantly throughout my game never dropping below 400. When i connect to the internet using my phone's internet it is back to normal at 135 ping but for some reason my standard internet is having serious issues, I was wondering if there any way you guys could help figure out what has been causing it.

replies.body: It sounds like you might be having a connection problem like packet loss, which can be caused by instability or how your ISP is routing to us.  Your ticket has been received, as well as your logs!  In the meantime, I suggest going through the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help rule out possibilities.  We'll reply back as soon as we can!

I have filled out a ticket Here could someone please help me, the is virtually unplayable. Request #27927793
Ping issues/Lag past 3 days ever since mid patch update to fix black screen bug. https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/27927793?page=1
